documentation.title: Getting Started
documentation.content: Welcome to the WiFi Pineapple web interface. This guide will help you get started with basic operations and configuration.
documentation.examples:
# Basic setup
configure network --interface wlan0 --mode AP
start pineap --ssid-pool 50

documentation.title: PineAP Configuration
documentation.content: PineAP is the core component that handles access point functionality and client management.
documentation.examples:
# Enable PineAP
pineap enable

# Add SSID to pool
pineap add-ssid "FreeWiFi"

# Set beacon interval
pineap set-beacon-interval 100

faqs.question: How do I reset the device to factory settings?
faqs.answer: To reset the device, hold the reset button for 10 seconds while powering on. This will restore all settings to default.

faqs.question: Why can't I see any networks in the recon module?
faqs.answer: Ensure that your wireless interfaces are properly configured and that you have the correct drivers installed. Check the interface status in the networking module.
